source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000010_TANSUI<tab>Gentlemen! I am told you were most unreceptive to my associate's requests.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000010_TANSUI<tab>おい、お前ら。
うちの若いのを、随分邪険に扱ってくれたらしいな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000020_TANSUI<tab>I realize you do not look kindly on the Confederacy and her ways. But if you refuse to pay the Ruby Tithe, your safety in these waters cannot be assured.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000020_TANSUI<tab>こちとら海賊衆だ、煙たがるのはまあわかる。
だが、帆別銭をいただかねぇことには、
この先の航海の安全は、約束できねぇぞ？

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000030_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>Spare me your concern, pirate.
Your feeble attempts at extortion will not work on us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000030_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>フン、そうもあからさまに虚勢を張られると、
いっそ憐れみさえ覚えるな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000040_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>You remain at large because we allow it─because you are such insignificant little pests that we see no need to swat you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000040_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>これまで貴様らに勝手を許していたのは、
単に「小蝿は捨て置け」との命が下っていたからのこと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000050_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>But if you wish to risk the ire of the viceroy, by all means, fire upon an imperial vessel. Give us a reason to bring the full might of the Garlean Empire to bear against your pathetic fleet.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000050_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>しかし我らが代理総督殿は、海賊衆のことがお嫌いなようだ。
小舟一艘でも襲撃されれば、それが開戦の口火となること……
貴様らも、よくわかっていよう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000060_TESHITAPIRATE<tab>Bastards!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000060_TESHITAPIRATE<tab>く、くっそぉ……！

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000070_TANSUI<tab>Gentlemen. Surely the fact that you have such limitless resources at your disposal gives you all the more reason to spare some few coins for the
less fortunate?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000070_TANSUI<tab>……それだけご自慢の後ろ盾をお持ちなら、
小銭くらい、景気よく払ってもらいたいもんだがね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000080_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>All talk, just as I thought. Come─let us away. I have no time for this rubbish.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000080_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>その喧嘩を買ってやるほど暇ではない。
……行くぞ、船を出せ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000090_LYSE<tab>We're all the same to them, aren't we? Savages to be ruled or slaughtered.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000090_LYSE<tab>帝国の横暴は、どこに行っても同じ……
支配する者と、支配される者にしかならないんだ……。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000100_TANSUI<tab>They've always balked at paying the Ruby Tithe.
But they were never so eager to pick a fight...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000100_TANSUI<tab>昔から、何かにつけて帆別銭を渋る連中だ。
好きこのんじゃいないものの、仲たがいをしたつもりも、
なかったんだがな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000110_TANSUI<tab>The problem, you see, is that many of my comrades in the Confederacy are of Doman descent─and the acting viceroy...well, she's none too fond of Domans, to say the least.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000110_TANSUI<tab>俺は、ひんがしの国の出だが、海賊衆にはドマ出身の奴も多い。
ドマの代理総督サマは、それが気に入らないらしいのさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000120_TANSUI<tab>If we take any action to hinder the safe passage of an imperial vessel, she'll accuse us of attempting to foment rebellion and brand us enemies of the Empire─which we can ill afford to be. Like the man said, we're all talk.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000120_TANSUI<tab>帝国の活動への干渉を禁ず、さもなくば敵とみなす……なんて、
事実上の服従勧告を投げてきやがった。
おかげで俺らは、すっかりハリボテだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000130_ALISAIE<tab>And where do the Kojin stand in all this?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000130_ALISAIE<tab>コウジン族が帝国についていたのは？
彼らも脅されているの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000140_TANSUI<tab>With the winning side, of course. They are mercenaries to a fault, eager to offer their services without coercion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000140_TANSUI<tab>あいつらは、勝ち馬に乗っただけさ。
もともと傭兵業も盛んな一族だし、抵抗はねぇんだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000150_TANSUI<tab>The shellback could tell you more...though something tells me he would rather not.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000150_TANSUI<tab>ま、そのあたりの事情は、ソロバンに聞くといい。
……って、野郎、バツが悪くて引っ込みやがったな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000160_LYSE<tab>I don't understand. If the Garleans are causing the Confederacy this much trouble─and if so many of you are Doman to begin with─why aren't you willing to fight back?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000160_LYSE<tab>ねえ、あなたたちは、帝国のせいで困ってる。
ドマ出身の仲間だって、多いはずだよ。
それなのになぜ、帝国と戦おうとしないの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000170_TANSUI<tab>Hahaha! Spoken like a true friend of the Doman Liberation Front.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000170_TANSUI<tab>ははあ……さてはお前ら、
ドマ反乱軍の残党と、その助っ人ってとこか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000180_TANSUI<tab>If you're planning to rouse us with noble words and grand promises─don't bother. We all know what the imperial army can do. Compared to them, we're boys with boats.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000180_TANSUI<tab>お前らも惨敗したクチだろうに、そそのかしてくれるなよ。
帝国軍との戦力差がわからねぇほど、俺らは素人じゃねぇ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000190_TANSUI<tab>Besides, what ties a man may once have held to his home are forsaken upon joining the Confederacy. We look out for none but our own.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000190_TANSUI<tab>それに、仲間はみんな、
泣く泣く故郷と過去の因縁を捨てて、海賊衆に入ってるんだ。
国に報いず、報いられない……それが俺らさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000200_TANSUI<tab>Be that as it may, our livelihood is under threat, and the captain will need to decide soon whether we are to go down in a blaze of glory or bow and scrape for crumbs from the Emperor's table.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000200_TANSUI<tab>ま、このままだと、お飯の食い上げなのは事実だがな。
一矢報いて散るか、いっそ飼われて甘い蜜を吸わせてもらうか、
うちの頭領も決めなきゃならねぇ。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000210_TANSUI<tab>...All while our friend the viceroy continues her purge of Doma's “radical elements.” I believe she's holding court in one of the fishing villages even
as we speak.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000210_TANSUI<tab>代理総督サマの粛清が、
いよいよ海岸付近の村にも及んでるそうだしな。
ったく、これ見よがしに脅してくれたもんだぜ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000220_GOSETSU<tab>That she-devil! Her perfidy knows no bounds!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000220_GOSETSU<tab>なんと……！
あの女狐め、また悪行を重ねておったか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000230_GOSETSU<tab>She must be stopped. Come, let us find Soroban and put to sea at once!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000230_GOSETSU<tab>こうしてはおれん。
一刻も早く大陸側に渡り、村々の様子を確認せねば！
ソロバンをフン捕まえて、船を出すでござる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000240_TANSUI<tab>Tell the others that these ones have paid. We all have places to be.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000240_TANSUI<tab>あいつらの帆別銭は受け取ってる。
好きにさせてやれ。
……俺も、一度報告に帰るぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000250_ALISAIE<tab>Even accounting for the rebellion, such indiscriminate shows of force seem pointlessly excessive...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000250_ALISAIE<tab>反乱の後とはいえ、警備が厳重すぎると思うのだけど。
ちょっと異様な雰囲気ね……。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000260_GOSETSU<tab>If only you knew how commonplace such scenes have become.
Hmm... Are we too late?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000260_GOSETSU<tab>いや、拙者も長く離れてはおったが、
恐らくこれは、常の状態ではござらん。
ふぅむ……一足遅かったのか、間に合ったのか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000270_LYSE<tab>Over there─someone's coming!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000270_LYSE<tab>ねえ見て、誰か来る……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000280_GOSETSU<tab>...It is she! Sworn enemy of Doma─of my master! The traitor who sold her homeland to the Garleans─Yotsuyu!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000280_GOSETSU<tab>おお……おお……！
見間違うものか、奴こそドマの大敵！　主の仇！
祖国を売り飛ばした代理総督、ヨツユでござる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000290_LYSE<tab>The viceroy herself. And look─behind her! Isn't that...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000290_LYSE<tab>じゃあ、あれが、先の反乱で帝国の手引きをしたっていう……
ドマ代理総督、ヨツユ……！
それに、うしろに控えてる奴って……。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000300_YOTSUYU<tab>Filth and squalor everywhere I look. How very Doman.
What I wouldn't do for a drink...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000300_YOTSUYU<tab>ああ……すみずみまで貧乏がしみこんでるねぇ。
まったく、まさしくドマの村だ。
おかげで酔いも醒めて、気分が悪くなってきたよ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000310_YOTSUYU<tab>Come now, you've no reason to look so afraid! You have lived through a quarter of a century of Garlean rule, remember?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000310_YOTSUYU<tab>なぁに、そんなに怯えないで？
考えてもごらんなさい、これまで25年間、
ドマは帝国の属州として生かされてきたんだ。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000320_YOTSUYU<tab>'Tis better to bend with the wind than stand tall and be broken.
Therein lies...hope. Therein lies freedom.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000320_YOTSUYU<tab>嵐が過ぎれば、逆らわなければ、
きっとまた……のうのうと……生きていけるよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000330_YOTSUYU<tab>I come before you today seeking affirmation. A heartfelt declaration. You are free to answer me as you see fit─yet even the least among you should know the correct response. Should.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000330_YOTSUYU<tab>そのために、あたしはお前さんたちの忠誠を問いにきた。
どうすればいいかは、餓鬼でもわかるだろう？
……だというのに。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000340_YOTSUYU<tab>A resident of your village─one of your neighbors, mayhap your friend─was detained by the Kojin this morning. They say he was attempting to flee to Kugane, but we both know that simply isn't true, don't we? Have you anything to say?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000340_YOTSUYU<tab>今朝、海を見張っていたコウジン族が、こいつを捕まえたんだ。
……この村の住民で間違いないね？
クガネにでも逃げようと思ったのかい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000350_YOTSUYU<tab>...A bit slow, this one. Is there anyone more sensible among you? Have any of you anything to say? To swear?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000350_YOTSUYU<tab>はぁ……馬鹿は庇いきれないねぇ……。
ほかのお利口さんたちは、こうならないでおくれよ。
それで……言うべきことは？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000360_E3F1VILLAGER<tab>M-My lady, I...I swear to serve the Empire! To do...whatever is asked of me...and never disobey...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000360_E3F1VILLAGER<tab>お、お、おらは……て、帝国に忠誠を誓う……！
命令には決して背かねぇ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000370_YOTSUYU<tab>Well said that man. Of course...it wouldn't do to simply take you at your word.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000370_YOTSUYU<tab>いいねぇ、よくできました。
それじゃあ……その言葉の証を立ててもらおうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000380_YOTSUYU<tab>Kill him. Surely you can do that much? He must be guilty of something or other, or he wouldn't have attempted to flee the Empire.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000380_YOTSUYU<tab>あれを殺しな。
逃げ出そうとするなんて、帝国に後ろ暗いものがある証拠。
忠誠を誓うなら……できるだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000390_E3F1VILLAGER<tab>I...I have a family... Kami forgive me... Kami forgive me...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000390_E3F1VILLAGER<tab>おらには……家族が……！
すまねぇ……本当に、すまねぇ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000400_YOTSUYU<tab>Very, very good! I've always had a soft spot for men like you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000400_YOTSUYU<tab>アッハ！　最高！
あたし、お前さんみたいな人は好きよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000410_YOTSUYU<tab>Next, I want you to shoot those two over there. Too old to work, you understand─a burden on the Empire, and we can't have that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000410_YOTSUYU<tab>じゃあ次……
そこの老いぼれどもを殺しなさい。
労働力にもならない連中は、帝国に不要でしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000420_E3F1VILLAGER<tab>But...they're my parents. You can't expect me to...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000420_E3F1VILLAGER<tab>そ、そんな……！
おらの、おっとうと、おっかあだ！
できるわけがねぇ……どうか、それだけは……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000430_E3F1VILLAGER<tab>Ugh... Ngh... Grrraaagh!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000430_E3F1VILLAGER<tab>う、ぐ……う…………
うわあああああああッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>...We will show them no mercy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>……行こう、ゴウセツ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We can't. Not now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>今はこらえるんだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000440_ALISAIE<tab>Stop and think for a moment! If you go charging in now, every one of those villagers is as good as dead!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000440_ALISAIE<tab>待ちなさい！
あなたたちがどれほど強くても、
あんな至近距離で人質を取られてたら、ろくに動けないわ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000450_ALISAIE<tab><var 08 E905 ((She's)) ((He's)) /var> right. They would simply take the villagers hostage.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000450_ALISAIE<tab>そのとおりよ。
あんな至近距離で人質をとられてたら、ろくに動けないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000460_ALISAIE<tab>We must consider the wider picture. If we act recklessly, we risk alerting the Garleans to our presence here, making it that much harder for us to work with the local rebels─to say nothing of the reprisals ordinary civilians would be made to suffer.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000460_ALISAIE<tab>下手に決着がつかなければ、帝国軍の警戒を煽って、
不意を衝いての解放運動が難しくなる。
ドマの民だって、どんな制裁を受けることになるか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000470_GOSETSU<tab>Open your eyes, girl─they are already suffering! Let me go─I am putting an end to this madness!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000470_GOSETSU<tab>止めてくれるな……ッ！
拙者は、今すぐ、あの狼藉をやめさせねばならぬ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000480_GOSETSU<tab>I will approach the village alone and identify myself. As a former leader of the rebellion and a known fugitive, they will wish to detain me until they are certain they have learned all I know. Use this time to make your plans!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000480_GOSETSU<tab>今は落武者なれども、拙者はドマの侍大将……。
奴らに姿を晒し、あえて囚われれば、尋問にもかけられよう。
おぬしらは、その隙に策を成せぃ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000490_LYSE<tab>You saw what those monsters did to the villagers! Who knows what they'll do to you─assuming they don't kill you where you stand!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000490_LYSE<tab>そんな……あんなヤツ相手じゃ、命の保証がない！
あなたの目的はドマの奪還なのに、
こんなところで死んでもいいっていうの！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000500_GOSETSU<tab>We live and die at the pleasure of the kami. My fate is in their hands, and no other's. If it be of any comfort, I am no stranger to chains.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000500_GOSETSU<tab>そのときは、それが拙者の役目であっただけのこと。
天命が尽きるまでは、決して死なんッ！
何より拙者、こう見えて、捕まるのには慣れているでござる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000510_LYSE<tab>You can't expect us to stand idly by as a comrade goes marching off to his death! And this is nothing like Kugane!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000510_LYSE<tab>クガネでのこと……？
でも、それとこれとは……！
仲間が死ぬかもしれないのを、みすみす見逃せないよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000520_ALISAIE<tab>...Nor is it like the Reach, Lyse─or the Wall. Let him go.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000520_ALISAIE<tab>リセ……あの敗北のあとだもの、気持ちは痛いほどわかる。
でも、負けた私たちだからこそ、
きっと今までよりも前を見なきゃいけないんだわ。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000530_ALISAIE<tab>Hold out for as long as you can, but remember: noble sacrifices are to remain an absolute last resort. I wish I could say it won't come to that, but only the gods know how we're going to get you and the others out in one piece.
A miracle, perchance...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000530_ALISAIE<tab>今後もふまえて解決策を出すのは、少しばかり難題よ。
つらいと思うけど、時間稼ぎをお願い。
ただし、死ぬのは絶対回避すること……いいわね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000540_GOSETSU<tab>A great tower stands to the north and east. Look to its occupants for aid and succor. Together, you may yet find your miracle.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000540_GOSETSU<tab>承知つかまつった！
おぬしらは一旦ここを離れ、北東に見える塔を目指せ。
そこにいる連中とならば、奇策も浮かぶやも知れぬ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000550_GOSETSU<tab>Now, leave this place. I must go.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000550_GOSETSU<tab>……では、行くでござる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000560_YOTSUYU<tab>Tsk tsk... Another idiot like all the rest. I'm beginning to think it may be something fundamental, something intrinsic, something quintessentially Doman to ignore the simple truth: you can't do a damn thing if you're dead.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000560_YOTSUYU<tab>どいつもこいつも、本当に馬鹿だねぇ。
骨の髄まで、くだらないドマの精神にどっぷり……
結局、生きなければ何もできないっていうのにね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000570_GOSETSU<tab>Enough, Yotsuyu!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000570_GOSETSU<tab>いい加減にせぬか、ヨツユ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000580_YOTSUYU<tab>Well now...this is a surprise.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000580_YOTSUYU<tab>これはこれは……
随分と大物がかかったようだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000590_GOSETSU<tab>Hear me, Yotsuyu: cease this farce, here and now, and I shall surrender myself to you. Refuse, and all shall answer to my blade.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000590_GOSETSU<tab>その者らに、これ以上の狼藉は許さぬ！
拙者の身柄で手を引け。
さもなくば、ここで千人斬りの刀を抜こうぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000600_YOTSUYU<tab>...Bring him to the tavern.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000600_YOTSUYU<tab>……捕まえな。
そこの酒場ででも、話を聞かせてもらおうじゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000610_TANSUI<tab>Our most compassionate acquaintances return. For your deeds, we owe you many thanks.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000610_TANSUI<tab>ああ、お前らか……。
いろいろと、働いてくれたらしいな。
すまねぇ、恩に着る。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000620_TANSUI<tab>...But something tells me our thanks are not sufficient. The strange thing is, I was certain you understood our position. And yet here you are with that same look in your eyes─and those same words upon your lips, I'll wager.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000620_TANSUI<tab>……で、こっちの事情はわかってるんだよな？
知ってて俺らのとこに来たんなら、
そちらさんの申し出には察しがつくが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000630_ALISAIE<tab>I speak only the truth. The Confederacy will not be spared Yotsuyu's wrath. You have always known this─that one day you would have no choice but to stand up to the Empire. I say to you that day is today, and come once more to ask that you join us in the fight.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000630_ALISAIE<tab>ええ、代理総督ヨツユの暴挙は、
もはや海賊衆としても見過ごせないはずよ。
改めて……力を貸すから、手を組んでほしいの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000640_TANSUI<tab>How convenient that recent events should lend such credence to your claims. Tell me, do death and destruction always follow in your wake?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000640_TANSUI<tab>……まったく、折が良すぎるってもんだろ。
さてはお前ら、綺麗なナリして疫病神の類か？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000650_RASHO<tab>They had no part in it, Tansui. You know this. We all know this.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000650_RASHO<tab>タンスイ。
やめておけ、この件は彼女たちの差し金ではない。
それは、俺たち全員がわかっていることだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000660_RASHO<tab>They came and took our Doman brothers. They will torture them for her sport─murder them for her satisfaction.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000660_RASHO<tab>海賊衆に逃げ込んだドマ人を、連れ戻して、嬲り殺す……。
いかにも、あの代理総督が好みそうな暴虐だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000670_RASHO<tab>So we attack, and get butchered for our trouble...or do naught, and let them have their pound of flesh.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000670_RASHO<tab>拐われた連中は、イサリ村に連行されている可能性が高い。
それで俺たちが仕掛ければ報復として皆殺し、
動かなくとも、じわじわと壊滅に追い込む……という魂胆か。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000680_RASHO<tab>If this be our choice, I say we suffer the ignominy. We endure. We survive. There is no better path.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000680_RASHO<tab>どのみち、ろくな選択肢はない。
だが、仲間を一手に失うくらいならば、
しばし針の筵（むしろ）に坐して、挽回の兆しを待つ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000690_RASHO<tab>Until the day our enemy is grown weaker, and we stronger, there can be no retribution. We will wait for a sign. Such is the judgment of the Confederacy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000690_RASHO<tab>……それが、海賊衆頭領としての返答だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000700_LYSE<tab>So that's it, then. You're just going to abandon them. To her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000700_LYSE<tab>それは、拐われた仲間を見捨てるってことだよね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000710_LYSE<tab>They'd die for you, you know─for the Confederacy. They would die for you, but you wouldn't even think to risk your lives for theirs!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000710_LYSE<tab>そんなことを一度でも許せば、あなたたちは、
命より大事なものを失うかもしれない……
本当に、それでいいの！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000720_ALISAIE<tab>I have one last idea, if you will allow. I'm afraid it's not very good as ideas go─it's exceedingly reckless, in fact, and you may well come to despise me for ever having suggested it. Assuming we survive, that is.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000720_ALISAIE<tab>ねえ、ひとつだけ、交渉の材料がまだ残ってるの。
我ながら酷い思いつきというか、
ちっとも楽じゃなくて、名案とは言い難い、泥臭いやつ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000730_ALISAIE<tab>The question being: do you trust me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000730_ALISAIE<tab>……巻き込んでも、いい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Do you even need to ask?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何をいまさら！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ask me again later.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>ほかに方法がないなら……

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000740_LYSE<tab>We can't stand by and let innocent people suffer─here or anywhere else.
I'll do whatever it takes.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000740_LYSE<tab>あの人たちを、このままにしておくなんて、できないもんね。
どこの国でだって、帝国に虐げられる人を見捨てたくない……！
アタシも、何でもする！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000750_ALISAIE<tab>Then let us roll the dice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000750_ALISAIE<tab>……ありがと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000760_ALISAIE<tab>If it's a sign you want, we shall give you one. One rousing enough to make you drive every Garlean out of Isari without a second thought.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000760_ALISAIE<tab>あなたたちの主張はよくわかったわ。
だったら、私たちが、挽回の兆しとやらを見せてあげる。
思わず立ち上がりたくなるような、とびっきりのをね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000770_ALISAIE<tab>You are wary of invoking the ire of the imperial forces stationed in Doma, correct?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000770_ALISAIE<tab>結局、そっちが危惧してるのって、
イサリ村にいる兵に太刀打ちできるかどうかじゃなく、
そのあと、ドマに控えてる帝国軍から報復を受けることでしょ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000780_ALISAIE<tab>Know then that once we have rescued our comrade and freed Isari, we mean to liberate the nation as a whole.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000780_ALISAIE<tab>その不安を払拭するわ。
私たちは、あの村と仲間を救ったあとに、
ドマそのものを解放する。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000790_ALISAIE<tab>You will doubtless require assurances that we are capable of achieving this─and that is only fair. Accordingly, we shall demonstrate our seriousness by depriving the Garleans of a key ally: the Kojin.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000790_ALISAIE<tab>そして今、それを成すだけの実力があると、示してみせる。
そうね……敵の戦力を削ぐって意味でも、
ここらのコウジン族を、一手に引き受けるのなんてどう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000800_TANSUI<tab>What, the three of you? Just like that?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000800_TANSUI<tab>コウジン族を？　お前らだけで？
ハッ、馬鹿いってんじゃねぇ！
そんなこと…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000810_ALISAIE<tab>Actually, my esteemed colleague here will attend to it on <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> own. But the how of it is not your concern─only the outcome.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000810_ALISAIE<tab>きっと思ってる以上に強いわよ？
とくに、この人は……。
馬鹿みたいな絵空事を、何度だって現実にしてきた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000820_ALISAIE<tab>If we succeed, you help us liberate Isari. If we fail, you lose nothing. A simple enough wager─if you have the stones for it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000820_ALISAIE<tab>私たちの出す成果を見て、賭けてみたくなったら、
イサリ村の奪還で応えてちょうだい。
東の海賊が、博打嫌いでないのならね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000830_TANSUI<tab>The little miss does make it hard to refuse, does she not?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000830_TANSUI<tab>……どうするよ、頭領。
こうまで言われちゃ、尻込みしづらいぜ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000840_RASHO<tab>Words are air. We will weigh you by your deeds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000840_RASHO<tab>……ならば、お手並み拝見といこう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000850_ALISAIE<tab>Is that light I see up ahead?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000850_ALISAIE<tab>何かしら、妙に明るい気が……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000860_LYSE<tab>[SURPRISED GASP REAX]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000860_LYSE<tab>うわぁ～っ！

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000870_ALISAIE<tab>We, uh...appear to be standing inside a giant bubble.
By the Twelve...I think we're on the seabed!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000870_ALISAIE<tab>すごい……！
これは……大きな水泡の中……？
私たち、海底にいるんだわ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000880_SOROBAN<tab>Well, well! I thought I heard familiar voices.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000880_SOROBAN<tab>(-？？？？-)あれぇ～？
聞いたことある声だなぁって思ったけど、
アンタたちだったかぁ～。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000890_LYSE<tab>Soroban? What are you doing here?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000890_LYSE<tab>ソ、ソロバン！？
なんで、こんなところに？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000900_SOROBAN<tab>Hmm? What a curious question. I live here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000900_SOROBAN<tab>うん～？
なんでもなにも、自分の拠点だしなぁ～。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000910_LYSE<tab>Then this is the home of the Blue Kojin?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000910_LYSE<tab>ええっ！？
じゃあ、もしかしてここが、碧甲羅の……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000920_SOROBAN<tab>Just so. I bid you welcome to Tamamizu!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000920_SOROBAN<tab>そうだよぉ～。
オイラたちの「碧のタマミズ」へ、ようこそぉ～！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000930_BUNCHIN<tab>Welcome, guests. Gratitude to you for aiding Soroban in his negotiations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000930_BUNCHIN<tab>フォフォフォ……。
歓迎しますぞぉ～、お客人方。
ソロバンが、良い取引をさせていただいたそうで……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000940_ALISAIE<tab>We thank you for your hospitality, honored elder. Pray forgive me my brevity, but I wish to discuss an urgent matter...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000940_ALISAIE<tab>はじめまして、碧甲羅の長老さん。
さっそくだけど、相談に乗ってもらいたいことがあるの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000950_BUNCHIN<tab>So...you seek to compel our Red brothers to forgo hostilities for a time.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000950_BUNCHIN<tab>なるほど、なるほどぉ～。
帝国軍に与するコウジン族……つまり紅甲羅の連中を、
しばし大人しくさせておきたいということですなぁ～。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000960_LYSE<tab>That's right. We know your two clans have your...differences, but what with you being...brothers and all, we thought you might be able to share some...secret knowledge...or something?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000960_LYSE<tab>彼らとあなたたちは、あまり仲が良くないって聞いてるけど、
一応は同族……なんだよね？
こんな相談、やっぱり嫌かな……？

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000970_BUNCHIN<tab>From far above, you have journeyed here in search of our wisdom.
You shall have it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000970_BUNCHIN<tab>ふぅ～む……。
遠路はるばる、海底まで来てくださったことじゃぁ～。
ワシらコウジン族のことを、少しお話ししましょう。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000980_BUNCHIN<tab>All creation is a tapestry, through which the divine is interwoven.
Kami are legion, and they can be found in the great and the small.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000980_BUNCHIN<tab>ワシらは、この世の森羅万象を織り成す、
八百万の神を祀っておりますのじゃぁ～。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000990_BUNCHIN<tab>Though they come and go as they please, they favor certain vessels.
The ancient. The precious. The exquisite.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_000990_BUNCHIN<tab>神々は、この世におわす際、然るべき「物」に宿られる……。
古き物、逸品と呼ばれる物、いわくのついた物などが、
特に好まれると言われておりますなぁ～。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001000_BUNCHIN<tab>We Kojin covet these vessels, these treasures. We go forth and bring them home, to keep them safe and bask in their divinity. They bring prosperity and joy to us and our children.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001000_BUNCHIN<tab>コウジン族は、そういった神の宿りし物、
あるいはそれにふさわしき宝を集めることで、
代々繁栄して参りました……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001010_BUNCHIN<tab>Yet how were we to seek these treasures above if we made enemies of the Garlean Empire, powerful and far-reaching as they are?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001010_BUNCHIN<tab>しかし、一大勢力を誇るガレマール帝国を敵にしては、
宝物を探すにしても、元手となる金銭を稼ぐにしても、
あまりに厄介でございましょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001020_BUNCHIN<tab>Wiser to join with them. So resolved the Red Kojin.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001020_BUNCHIN<tab>そこで、紅甲羅の連中は、
早々に帝国軍と組むことを選んだのじゃぁ～。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001030_SOROBAN<tab>Cautiously and carefully, for the Garleans are blind to the divine. Nor will they suffer their subjects to see.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001030_SOROBAN<tab>でもさぁ～、ガレマール帝国ってのは、
どんな神様も認めちゃいないんだってねぇ～。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001040_SOROBAN<tab>So the Red masquerade as mercenaries who seek money and power and never speak of their faith in the presence of their masters.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001040_SOROBAN<tab>だから、紅甲羅たちは、神様のことを隠して、
単にお金を稼ぎたいフリをしてるんだってさぁ～。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001050_SOROBAN<tab>To honor the divine, they deny it. A twisted and misguided path.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001050_SOROBAN<tab>そこんとこ、オイラはどうかと思うんだよなぁ～。
神様を大事にするため、やってることのはずなのに、
本末転倒っていうかさぁ～？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001060_BUNCHIN<tab>Aye, aye. Kami will not abide such foolishness, this they shall learn to their sorrow.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001060_BUNCHIN<tab>然り、まったくけしからんことじゃぁ～。
バチのひとつも、あたるべきでしょう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001070_BUNCHIN<tab>While our Red brothers live by the sword, we Blue Kojin uphold the old ways, engaging in trade and valuing peace.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001070_BUNCHIN<tab>もとより、ワシら碧甲羅は、
武力ではなく縁（えにし）の力……
すなわち交易や商売によって、宝物を集めんとしております。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001080_BUNCHIN<tab>Alas, men distinguish not between our clans, and judgment for the doings of the Red falls unjustly upon the Blue. Thus do men grow more and more reluctant to deal with us, denying us our treasures. This cannot continue!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001080_BUNCHIN<tab>されど昨今の紅甲羅の振る舞いによって、
縁は断たれ、得るべきものが得られなくなっている……。
ワシらも、そろそろ御冠ですぞぉ～！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001090_ALISAIE<tab>On that point we are in agreement. You are willing to aid our cause, then?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001090_ALISAIE<tab>それじゃあ、協力してもらえると思っていいのかしら……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001100_BUNCHIN<tab>There is a way that the Red may be driven to retreat into their shells.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001100_BUNCHIN<tab>ええ、もちろんですともぉ～。
紅甲羅の奴らの首を、ひゅひゅっと引っ込める方法を、
教えてしんぜましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001110_BUNCHIN<tab>But to share with you this knowledge is to reveal secrets of the divine. Assurances must first be had. Trust forged. A bargain struck.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001110_BUNCHIN<tab>ただし、ワシらの秘蔵中の秘蔵を、明かすことになります。
ゆえに、互いを信頼の糸で結ぶためにも、
先にひとつ、取引をしていただけませんかなぁ～？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001120_SOROBAN<tab>Well said, Elder! In great crises is great profit to be had!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001120_SOROBAN<tab>おっ、さっすが長老ぉ～！
うまいこと言って、ガッポリ稼ぐ算段だぁ～？

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001130_BUNCHIN<tab>Delight not overmuch in such things, Soroban.
Now, tell our guests what must be done.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001130_BUNCHIN<tab>フォフォフォ……。
ソロバン、それは口に出してはならんぞぉ～。
ともかく、例の件について、お客人方にご案内するのじゃぁ～。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001140_SOROBAN<tab>As you wish!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001140_SOROBAN<tab>がってんだぁ～！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001150_LYSE<tab>Well, I've no idea what we've gotten ourselves into, but so far, so good, right?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001150_LYSE<tab>な、なんかちょっと不安だけど、
ここはやるしかない……のかな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001160_SOROBAN<tab>It is done. Your offerings have been given to the sea.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001160_SOROBAN<tab>お待たせぇ～。
無事に、アンタたちの分の捧物を、海に捧げてきたよぉ～。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001170_SOROBAN<tab>The ritual can begin at last. Come and stand before me, my friends.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001170_SOROBAN<tab>これで準備は万端だぁ～。
さっそくおまじないをかけてあげるから、
そこに並んでよぉ～。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001180_SOROBAN<tab>Yes, yes. Listen to my words, and let all else wash away. Listen to my words, and feel them flow into your heart...at first a trickle, then a flood...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001180_SOROBAN<tab>うんうん～。
それじゃあ、肩の力を抜いてぇ～。
オイラの唱えることを、心の中で復唱するんだよぉ～。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001190_SOROBAN<tab>O kami of the fathomless waters,
Of the fallen, the ascended, the flowing, and the becalmed,
Caretakers of the shallows and of the depths...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001190_SOROBAN<tab>海におわします、諸々の神様。
冥きもの、輝けるもの、流れるもの、淀むもの、
大海原を満ち引きさせる、有りと有らゆる神々よ。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001200_SOROBAN<tab>Receive of us our meager offerings,
Cleanse these ones of earth and stone, and grant them your blessing,
That they might drink deep of the divine...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001200_SOROBAN<tab>この者奉る品々の捧物をお納めになりて、
陸の穢れを祓い、海神の恩を給わらんと申すこと、
いざ聞し召せと畏み畏み申す……。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001210_SOROBAN<tab>The ritual is complete, my friends.
You may now breathe in the depths as you would upon land.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001210_SOROBAN<tab>はい、おまじない完了ぉ～。
これで、アンタたちと、アンタたちの使役する獣くらいは、
水中でも不便なく活動できるんじゃないかなぁ～。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001220_ALISAIE<tab>Strange. I don't feel any different. Are you sure it worked?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001220_ALISAIE<tab>かなぁ……って、本当に？
体に変化があったようには思えないけど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001230_SOROBAN<tab>...Reasonably. The blessing does have its limits, of course. While it will allow you to dwell in the depths, it will not help you traverse them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001230_SOROBAN<tab>多分、大丈夫だよぉ～。
ああでも、あくまで水中にいられるようになっただけで、
泳ぎが達者になったってわけじゃないかなぁ～。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001240_LYSE<tab>I can swim well enough. How about you, Alisaie?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001240_LYSE<tab>アタシは泳げるけど……
アリゼーは平気？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001250_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, like a fish. In contrast to my doggy-paddling brother.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001250_ALISAIE<tab>よくぞ聞いてくれたわ。
アルフィノは泳げないけど、私は水泳が得意よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001251_ALISAIE<tab>Somehow, the boy just isn't very buoyant.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001251_ALISAIE<tab>……そう、アルフィノは泳げないけどねっ！

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001260_SOROBAN<tab>Hmm...skilled or no, your bodies are ill-suited to the sea.
Your cause demands alacrity, and you shall have it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001260_SOROBAN<tab>だけど、ヒトの体は、水を捕まえにくそうだからなぁ～。
急ぐ事情もあるみたいだし、特別に、
オイラたちと仲良しの海獣を紹介してあげるよぉ～。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001270_SOROBAN<tab>But first, let us take to the water.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001270_SOROBAN<tab>何はともあれ、海に入ってからだねぇ～。
さあさあ、行ってみよぉ～！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001280_ALISAIE<tab>Incredible... I could swear I was breathing air!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001280_ALISAIE<tab>すごい……！
陸地にいるときと、まるで変わらないわ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001290_SOROBAN<tab>Now, I shall summon for you noble steeds of great strength.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001290_SOROBAN<tab>それじゃ、さっそく助っ人を呼んでみるよぉ～。
見ててごらん、ス～イスイって来てくれるはずだからぁ～！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001300_LYSE<tab>Wow, look at them! I bet they could take us all the way to the deepest depths of the sea!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001300_LYSE<tab>わっ、あなたたちが助っ人！？
ありがとう、海の果てまででも行けちゃいそうだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001310_ALISAIE<tab>And so they may─after we've won over the Confederacy, rescued Gosetsu, and liberated your respective homelands.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001310_ALISAIE<tab>そんな遠出は、ご勘弁願いたいけどね？
ゴウセツも、ラショウたちも待たせてるんだから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001311_SOROBAN<tab>Should you become parted from your steeds, return to me, and I shall call them again. Take care, my friends, and may the kami speed you on your way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001311_SOROBAN<tab>もし、そいつらとはぐれちゃったら、
オイラに声をかけてくれれば、また呼ぶからさぁ～。
気を付けて、いってらっしゃ～い！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001320_LYSE<tab>We'll find that treasure in no time! Come on!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001320_LYSE<tab>行こう！
この海の先に、探し物はきっとあるよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001329_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in the tavern of Isari...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001329_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>一方 イサリ村――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001330_GRYNEWAHT<tab>[HITTING GOSETSU EXERTION GRUNT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001330_GRYNEWAHT<tab>フンッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001340_GOSETSU<tab>[GETTING HIT HARD REAX]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001340_GOSETSU<tab>グッ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001350_YOTSUYU<tab>I tire of this filthy tavern and its still filthier clientele.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001350_YOTSUYU<tab>いいかげん、この汚い酒場で、
お前さんの相手をするのも、飽きたんだけどねぇ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001360_GOSETSU<tab>'Tis scant reward for your treachery, aye. A painted woman of your rich experience deserves a better class of customer.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001360_GOSETSU<tab>フッ……。
廓きっての女狐が、国を売って偉くなったものよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001370_YOTSUYU<tab>Name-calling? Is that what we've been reduced to?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001370_YOTSUYU<tab>聞き飽きてるのよ、そういう負け惜しみは。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001380_GOSETSU<tab>Orphan of the Naeuri, widow of Sashihai─what joy it must have brought you to be revenged upon us all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001380_GOSETSU<tab>では、ナエウリの忌み子と呼ぶか。
それとも、サシハイの寡婦と呼ぶか……。
こうして祖国を蹂躙し、おぬしの気は晴れたでござるか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001390_YOTSUYU<tab>Not enough. Not nearly enough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001390_YOTSUYU<tab>そこまで調べてあるのなら、問うまでもないだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001400_YOTSUYU<tab>My appetite for your agony is as an abyss─bottomless. Insatiable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001400_YOTSUYU<tab>あたしの腹は底なしの沼……満足にはまだ、ほど遠い……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001410_YOTSUYU<tab>Before you die, you will cry and beg and prostrate yourself upon the earth. You will crawl on your belly through the muck and the piss, and debase yourself for my amusement. All of you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001410_YOTSUYU<tab>だから、もっともっと酷くしてあげる。
お前さんたちの泣き声と、哀れに地を這う醜態で、
この耳と目を慰めておくれよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001420_YOTSUYU<tab>But you think you are made of sterner stuff. Hm. Rather than have him beat you, mayhap I should have my oaf go and fetch your master's head...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001420_YOTSUYU<tab>でも、お前さんは図太いからねぇ……。
うちの木偶の坊に殴らせてるより、
亡き主君様の首を持ってきた方が、喜ぶかい？

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001430_YOTSUYU<tab>Poor, poor Lord Kaien─kami rest his soul! Noble leader of a fallen nation...
A fine puppet he made for the viceroy─for a time.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001430_YOTSUYU<tab>アッハ！　そう、ドマの殿君、カイエン様！
帝国に国を落とされ、総督に操られる仮初の将になっても、
お前さんにとっちゃ、大事な主君様だったものねぇ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001440_YOTSUYU<tab>Twenty-five years he was content to serve his masters as a dog. And then everyone had to rise up and get themselves killed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001440_YOTSUYU<tab>25年前、せっかく命を見逃されたんだ……
そのまま犬として飼われていればよかったものを、
ここにきて反乱なんて企てた上、民を逃がして討ち死になんて！

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001450_YOTSUYU<tab>Tell me, how did it feel to fail him that day?
To live with the disgrace of his death.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001450_YOTSUYU<tab>ねえ、あの日、お前さんはどんな気分だったの？
主君を守れず、自分だけ生き延びて！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001460_YOTSUYU<tab>Not that you were a stranger to living with disgrace, of course. In the, what was it, twenty-five years since you were humiliated and tossed into an imperial gaol, you had plenty of time to get used to it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001460_YOTSUYU<tab>まあ、主君と国を守れなかったのは初めてじゃないか。
お前さん、25年前も帝国兵に負けて、
牢に繋がれたんだもんねぇ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001470_YOTSUYU<tab>Oh yes, I heard the stories. About the samurai who would do anything to return to his master's side─even if it meant pledging his blade to his sworn enemy. They say he walked with death─that he slew a thousand men in the Empire's name. Truly a tale for the poets.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001470_YOTSUYU<tab>聞いた話じゃ、主君のもとに戻るため、
帝国の兵役まで甘んじて受けたそうじゃないか。
まるで修羅の如き殺人剣だったって、今でも伝説よぉ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001480_GOSETSU<tab>I do not deny my sins. But I will not be reproached by the likes of you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001480_GOSETSU<tab>……いずれも事実にござる。
おぬし相手に、今さら問答するようなことではござらん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001490_YOTSUYU<tab>Oh, I mean not to reproach you, but to praise you! You're a survivor, samurai. Just...like...me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001490_YOTSUYU<tab>やぁねぇ、そんなに睨まないでよ。
あたし、生きるために手段を選ばない人って好きよ？
……あたしとおそろいだからねぇ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001500_YOTSUYU<tab>So let us not dwell on the past, you and I, and instead give thought to the future. To wit, I would ask you again to help me resolve this vexing matter of Doma's missing heir.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001500_YOTSUYU<tab>そのよしみで、交渉してやろうって言ってるんだ。
帝国の御上の方々がね、ドマの王たりえるものの身柄を、
とっとと確保しろってうるさいのさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001510_YOTSUYU<tab>Living or dead, it makes no difference really─but the Garleans are most insistent that we put this problem behind us, and I know you helped him flee. So, tell me: what became of Lord Hien?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001510_YOTSUYU<tab>つまりは、カイエン様の息子……
あんたと一緒に逃げてたはずの、ヒエン様のことをね。
死体の場所でも構わないから、白状しておくれよ。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001520_GOSETSU<tab>To my dismay, the details escape me at present.
Mayhap your dog could jog my memory?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001520_GOSETSU<tab>さぁて、のぉ。
おぬしの飼い犬が殴ってくるもので、
すっかり忘れてしまったでござる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001530_YOTSUYU<tab>Get on with it! And mark me, brute: there is no limit to how far you can fall.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001530_YOTSUYU<tab>……続けな。
こんな仕事もうまくやれないんじゃ、
今度は地の果てに左遷されるよ、木偶の坊。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001540_GRYNEWAHT<tab>Of all the bloody... <mumble> <mumble> When I get back to Eorzea, I'm going to find that little shite and I'm gonna make <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> pay...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001540_GRYNEWAHT<tab>うう……サセンはもう嫌だぁ……。
はやくエオルゼアに戻って、
アイツに仕返ししてやりたいど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001550_GRYNEWAHT<tab>[STRIKING GOSETSU EXERTION]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001550_GRYNEWAHT<tab>ウリャア！

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001560_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>Thieves! Thieves! Come to steal our most precious treasures!
You will pay for this sacrilege!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001560_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>貴様らァー！
さては、我らが宝物を盗み出すつもりかァー！
許さん、断じて許さんぞォー！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001570_LYSE<tab>That's the spirit! Now don't be shy─I'm more than ready for another round!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001570_LYSE<tab>そういうことにしといてあげる！
さあ、もういっちょ盛大に暴れるよッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001580_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>Seize them!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001580_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>ぐぐぐ……！
おのれ、奴らを取り押さえろォー！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001590_LYSE<tab>What in the world!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001590_LYSE<tab>えっ、なになに！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001600_SUSANO<tab>(-???-)Who...? Who hath made us whole?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001600_SUSANO<tab>(-神器から響く声-)ふぬ……。
分かたれし我が魂を集めたのは、誰ぞ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001610_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>Hark! A great kami stirs... Yes, yes, a great kami of the sacred treasures!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001610_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>おおーッ！？
もしや、神器にお眠りになっていた、
神の御霊がお目覚めになったのかァー！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001620_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>O great kami, we beseech your intercession! We who have guarded your blade and glass for generations─your faithful Kojin!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001620_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>神よ、神よ、聞し召しませェー！
その宝剣と鏡を集め、代々守りたるは、
我らコウジン族にございます！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>It was I who made you whole.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>マガタマを持ってきたのは自分だ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>If I made you whole, it was not my intent. I but carried the trinket.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>働いたのは彼らだけじゃない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001630_SUSANO<tab>(-???-)Thou didst freely deliver our jewel unto thine enemy's own treasure vault?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001630_SUSANO<tab>(-神器から響く声-)ふぅむ……しかし、双方争っているようではないか。
なれば貴様は、わざわざ敵の懐に、神器を届けにきてやったと？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001640_SUSANO<tab>(-???-)Hah hah hah! How auspicious! We do commend thee, <var 08 E905 ((daughter)) ((son)) /var> of man.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001640_SUSANO<tab>(-神器から響く声-)カッカッカッ、これは愉快！
ヒトの子にしては、なかなかどうして見どころがある！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001650_SUSANO<tab>(-???-)Such audacity is deserving of celebration, exultation─a contest of wills to mark the occasion! Let lines be drawn! Let sides be chosen! And for their loyalty, we shall stand with the caretakers of our greater part.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001650_SUSANO<tab>(-神器から響く声-)その豪気、むしろ剣を交えて愉しむべき類か！
ふむ、我が器を集めた数にて、カメの子が勝っているならば、
そちらにつくのも道理であろうしな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001660_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, perfect. A contest of wills. Just what we need.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001660_ALISAIE<tab>ああ……。
なんだかすっごく嫌な予感……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001670_SUSANO<tab>(-???-)Hahahaha hah hah hah! Hearken to us, shelled ones! Upon this day, your wish shall be granted!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001670_SUSANO<tab>(-神器から響く声-)カッカッカッ！
しかれば此度は、カメの子の願いを聞くものと相成ろう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001680_SUSANO<tab>(-???-)Curse neither your fate nor its executor, children of man, for we are of the divine─of both heaven and earth. The ringing silence. The raging calm.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001680_SUSANO<tab>(-神器から響く声-)さりとて落胆するなよ、ヒトの子ら。
そも、神とは傍若無人。
凪ぐも猛るも思いのままの、天地海原そのものよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001690_SUSANO<tab>(-???-)All riseth and falleth at the whim of capricious fortune. Assume your marks upon the stage, and embrace the coming chaos!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001690_SUSANO<tab>(-神器から響く声-)不興を買うも鎮めるも、すべては祭りごと次第！
我の好みは、ちと荒々しいゆえ、覚悟して付き合えよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001700_SUSANO<tab>(-Susano-)We are Susano, and in revelry do we rejoice!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001700_SUSANO<tab>我が名は、スサノオ！
いざいざいざ、祭りであるッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001710_LYSE<tab>That...that's a primal standing in front of us, right?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001710_LYSE<tab>なっ……！？
これって、どう見ても蛮神じゃない！

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001720_ALISAIE<tab>And a horde of angry Kojin at our backs.
<sigh> This contest is getting worse by the moment.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001720_ALISAIE<tab>コウジン族もいたんじゃ、分が悪すぎる。
どうにかして仕切り直さないと……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001730_ALISAIE<tab>Lyse! Help me clear a path!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001730_ALISAIE<tab>リセ、ふたりで退路を確保するわよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001740_ALISAIE<tab>Leave them to us and save your strength. You'll be needing it soon enough.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001740_ALISAIE<tab>あなたは温存しておいて。
わかってると思うけど、大勝負がお待ちかねみたい。
それまでは、せめて私たちが！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001750_LYSE<tab>Make way, make way!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001750_LYSE<tab>そこ、どいてもらうよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001760_SUSANO<tab>(-Susano-)Spoil not your appetite for the feast, children of man. The dish will be served, whether you will it or no! Hah hah hah hah haaah!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001760_SUSANO<tab>カッカッカ……。
余興もいいが、我をあまり待たせるでないぞ、ヒトの子よ。
退屈しのぎに、ここら一帯を滅しかねんからなぁ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001769_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, off the coast of Othard...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001769_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>同日 紅玉海海上――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001770_TANSUI<tab>Nary a peep from the shellbacks, sir. It's enough to make one wonder...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001770_TANSUI<tab>ここまで、コウジン族のちょっかいはなしか。
にわかには信じがたいが……。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001780_SOROBAN<tab>The Red have sounded the alarum. The Isle of Zekki under attack;
fierce fighting in the stronghold.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001780_SOROBAN<tab>様子を見てきたよぉ～。
あのヒトたち、ゼッキ島に乗り込んで、
切った張ったの大騒ぎ！

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001790_SOROBAN<tab>The vault breached by outsiders, and strange tales from deep within.
All this, the Red cannot ignore.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001790_SOROBAN<tab>宝物殿で、なんだか妙なことが起きたようだけど、
戦いは続いてるみたいだねぇ～。
紅甲羅の連中も、こりゃたまらんって感じでさぁ～。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001800_SOROBAN<tab>Even now, they abandon their posts and flock to the isle.
The Garleans are powerless to stop them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001800_SOROBAN<tab>帝国軍の命令に従って各地の監視をしていたヤツまで、
みーんなあわててゼッキ島に戻ったみたいだぁ～。
ありゃ、あとで上官に怒られるだろうなぁ～。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001810_TANSUI<tab>I'll be damned. They did it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001810_TANSUI<tab>あいつら、本気でここら全域の紅甲羅を、
引き受けちまったってわけか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001820_TANSUI<tab>Well, Captain...wagers notwithstanding, I daresay we will not have a better opportunity to drive the imperials from Isari and rescue our men.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001820_TANSUI<tab>……で、どうするよ頭領。
イサリ村を攻めるなら、またとない好機だ。
あいつらとの約束もある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001830_TANSUI<tab>On the other hand, naught was put in writing... But if your mind is made up, then that is that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001830_TANSUI<tab>だが、所詮は口約束だしな。
お前に決定を覆すつもりがないなら、それはそれだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001840_TANSUI<tab>...I should add that if you were to change your mind, none would gainsay your decision, nor think you beholden to your past.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001840_TANSUI<tab>一応、二番手を預かる身として言わせてもらうぞ。
自分がドマ出身だってことを気にしてんなら、
そいつは実につまらねぇ杞憂だ。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001850_TANSUI<tab>Nor would anyone begrudge you a spot of revenge into the bargain.
Like the little miss said, we knew this day would come.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001850_TANSUI<tab>あの嬢ちゃんの言うとおり、こいつはとっくに海賊衆の問題……
仲間を奪還する中で、仮にお前の過去の復讐が果たせたとて、
咎める奴なんざいねぇさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001860_RASHO<tab>Isari may be a rotting husk, but at least the tavern keeper never watered down his drinks.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001860_RASHO<tab>……イサリ村はさびれているが、
あの酒場で出される酒は悪くなかった。
取り戻すか、そろそろ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001870_TANSUI<tab>Well said for a temperate man.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001870_TANSUI<tab>下戸のくせに、よく言う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001880_RASHO<tab>Hear me, comrades! We made a bargain with the Eorzeans, and I mean to uphold our end of it. I mean to remind the Garleans that this is our sea─that all here belongs to the Confederacy!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001880_RASHO<tab>あの旅人たちに繋ぎとめられた、海賊衆の矜持……
思い出せ、そして再び知らしめろ。
俺たちは奪われる者ではなく、この海の略奪者だ。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001890_RASHO<tab>All that is theirs is ours for the taking─and take it we shall.
We will strip them of everything they hold dear!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001890_RASHO<tab>思い上がった帝国の連中から、
獰猛に、望むがまま、一切合財を奪い尽くす。
さあ……略奪をはじめるぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001900_GRYNEWAHT<tab>This one is iron. My hands will break before he speaks.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001900_GRYNEWAHT<tab>ヨツユさま、こいつすげぇガンコだど。
このまま続けても、オラが疲れるだけで、
しゃべるとは思えないど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001910_YOTSUYU<tab>Ugh, kami give me strength. Are you good at anything?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001910_YOTSUYU<tab>そんなこと、誰だって見りゃわかるよ。
だからお前さんは、木偶の坊なのさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001920_YOTSUYU<tab>I had hoped this might prove more productive than blind inquiries, but I see you are determined to waste my time. Very well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001920_YOTSUYU<tab>あてもなく若様を探すよりはマシだと思って付き合ったけど、
さすがに時間の無駄ってものだ。
そろそろ、幕引きにしようじゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001930_YOTSUYU<tab>Line them up. Kill one for every question he refuses to answer.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001930_YOTSUYU<tab>そいつらを並べて。
ゴウセツがあたしの質問に黙るたび、順番に殺しな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001940_GOSETSU<tab>Hurt them, and you will get naught from me!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001940_GOSETSU<tab>その者らに手を出そうとすれば、先に拙者が命を絶つ……。
そう言ったのを、忘れてはござらんな……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001950_YOTSUYU<tab>You have given me precisely that thus far, so what have I to lose? Mark me, samurai─I will find Lord Hien, be it with your help or with your heads.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001950_YOTSUYU<tab>ああ、もちろん覚えてるから、ここまで付き合ったんだ。
だけど、埒が明かないんじゃ仕方がない……。
お前さんと、民草の首を並べて、ヒエン様を誘うとするさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001960_E3F1GARLEANSOLDIER<tab>(-???-)Confederate scum! You will pay for─ Aaargh!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001960_E3F1GARLEANSOLDIER<tab>(-帝国兵の声-)く、くそぉ、お前ら海賊衆か！？
こんなことをして、ただで済むと……うわあああッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001970_KIDNAPPEDPIRATE<tab>The Confederacy! They've come to save us!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001970_KIDNAPPEDPIRATE<tab>海賊衆だって……！？
お頭が、ラショウさんが、助けに来てくれたんだ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001980_YOTSUYU<tab>And this after I took such pains to cow them. Even pirates have their pride, I suppose. Enough to march to their deaths, no less. Oh, the stupidity of it all...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001980_YOTSUYU<tab>……あいつら、てっきり怖気づくと思ってたんだけどね。
意地を通して、もろとも死ぬ道を選んだわけか。
ああ……愚かすぎて吐き気がする。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001990_YOTSUYU<tab>It truly is a sickness... I shall just have to lance the boil. Drain them of every last trace of honor and compassion... Every last drop...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_001990_YOTSUYU<tab>でも……そうね、それが望みなら、あとで報復してあげる。
義理だの人情だのに毒された血を、一滴残らず絞り取ろうか。
ふふ、うふふ…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002000_GRYNEWAHT<tab>My lady, I... I'm going outside!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002000_GRYNEWAHT<tab>ヨ、ヨツユさま……？
オラ、外の様子をみてくるど！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002010_GRYNEWAHT<tab>[SURPRISED GRUNT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002010_GRYNEWAHT<tab>んがっ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002020_GOSETSU<tab>The kami are not finished with you yet...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002020_GOSETSU<tab>……天命は、尽きぬようだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002030_LYSE<tab>There's no end to them! They just keep coming!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002030_LYSE<tab>勇猛なのはいいけど……
どんどん集まってきて、キリがないね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002040_ALISAIE<tab>Then we must be doing something right. We have to hold out for as long as we can. <var 08 E905 ((She's)) ((He's)) /var> counting on us!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002040_ALISAIE<tab>ちゃんとコウジン族を引き付けられてる証拠でしょ！
あの人だって戦ってるんだもの。
私たちも、ねばるわよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002050_KOJINSOLDIER<tab>S-Susano is slain! Slain by the shell-less one!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002050_KOJINSOLDIER<tab>た、たいへんだァー！
スサノオ様が、やられちまったァー！
神退治をしたヒトが、出てくるぞォーッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002060_LYSE<tab>Is it true? Did you defeat him?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002060_LYSE<tab>あなた、大丈夫……！？
本当にスサノオを倒したの！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002070_LYSE<tab>Well, in that case─how do you fancy helping us keep the Kojin occupied until the Confederacy make their move?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002070_LYSE<tab>さすがだね……大役、おつかれさま。
アタシも、負けないように頑張る。
海賊衆を立ち上がらせるまで、何度でもやっちゃるよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002080_LYSE<tab>Speak of the devils─that's coming from Isari!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002080_LYSE<tab>狼煙……？
あっちって、イサリ村の方角じゃない！？
じゃあ、もしかして……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002090_ALISAIE<tab>I think we've done all we can here. Let's withdraw and make for the village.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002090_ALISAIE<tab>ええ、彼らが賭けに乗ってくれたみたいね。
だとしたら、この場に長居は不要……
撤退して、イサリ村に向かうわよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002100_LYSE<tab>Right! Although...they don't seem keen to let us go...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002100_LYSE<tab>了解っ！
だけど、紅甲羅のみんな……行かせてくれるかな？

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002110_ALISAIE<tab>Hear me, Kojin of the Red!
We have no quarrel with you─only your imperial masters!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002110_ALISAIE<tab>騒がせて悪かったわね。
謝るものでもないだろうし、あなたたちが帝国につく以上、
これからも敵対することになると思う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002120_ALISAIE<tab>No more blood need be shed this day! I pray you let us go in peace!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002120_ALISAIE<tab>だけど、今日のところは、これ以上暴れまわるつもりはないわ。
それを承知で、なお道を塞ごうというのなら……
全員まとめて、かかってきなさいッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002130_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>You dare speak to us of peace!? Your flesh will feed the fishes, thief! Attaaack!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002130_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>お、おのれ、侮辱しおってェー！
ひるむな、奴らを捕まえろォー！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002140_LYSE<tab>Now's our chance! Don't worry about her─she can handle herself!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002140_LYSE<tab>撤退しよう！
そのために、アリゼーが頑張ってるんだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002150_ALISAIE<tab>I can't let you take all the glory, can I?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002150_ALISAIE<tab>……あなたばっかりカッコイイんじゃ、ずるいもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002160_TANSUI<tab>My Eorzean friends! Saw the smoke, did you? A pity you did not come sooner─though I gather you were busy elsewhere.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002160_TANSUI<tab>ああ、狼煙は無事に見えたみたいだな。
これでお前らが戻ってこなかったら、
さすがに寝覚めが悪いってもんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002170_LYSE<tab>Gosetsu! You're alive! You're all alive...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002170_LYSE<tab>ゴウセツ、それにふたりも……！
無事で本当によかった……！

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002180_GOSETSU<tab>And full of vim and vigor, hah hah hah!
Did I not tell you I was no stranger to chains?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002180_GOSETSU<tab>ハッハッハ……。
捕まるのは慣れていると申したでござろう。
このとおり、ぴんぴんしておるわ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002190_ALISAIE<tab>The fighting cannot have lasted long. Where are all the imperials?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002190_ALISAIE<tab>村の様子を見るかぎり、
帝国軍が去って、まだ間もないという感じだけど……
状況はどうなの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002200_RASHO<tab>Fled. They stood their ground for a time─until it became clear that their Kojin reinforcements would not be coming.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002200_RASHO<tab>連中は、最初こそ抵抗していたものの、
コウジン族の援軍が望めないと知るや、あっさりと撤退した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002210_RASHO<tab>We took some few casualties, but my deeper regret is having let Yotsuyu slip through my fingers. That bodyguard of hers may be a half-wit, but he's a mean bastard on the battlefield.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002210_RASHO<tab>おかげで大した被害もなく、村を奪還できたのだが……
ヨツユは取り逃がしてしまった。
あの用心棒の男、頭は回らんようだが、力は相当なものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002220_TANSUI<tab>In any event, I imagine all involved are satisfied with this outcome. So far as the Empire is concerned, the Confederacy attacked Isari in retaliation for the viceroy's actions─and without the aid of insurrectionists, I might add.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002220_TANSUI<tab>お前らの筋書きどおり、この一件は、
帝国の横暴に耐えかねた海賊衆の襲撃ってことになってる。
反乱軍の一派と組んでるなんて、今は思っちゃないだろうよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002230_TANSUI<tab>Suffice it to say, we are prepared to be the subject of their undivided attention for the foreseeable future.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002230_TANSUI<tab>だから、まあ……
支度をしたら、とっとと先に行っとけ。
できるかぎりは、帝国軍の目を引いといてやる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ラショウたちに何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Doma shall be free. This we swear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ドマのことは任せろ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Don't do anything reckless.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>くれぐれも気をつけて

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>So you say...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>期待されても……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002240_RASHO<tab>Hm! An impossible claim, yet one spoken with such conviction that I cannot choose but believe it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002240_RASHO<tab>そうも迷いなく言われると、
不思議と成し遂げられる気がするものだ。
お前たちに賭けたのは間違いでなかったと、信じている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002250_RASHO<tab>Nor you. Our fates are intertwined now. If you fall, so do we.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002250_RASHO<tab>それはこちらの台詞だろう。
お前たちがドマを解放できなければ、いずれ俺たちも潰される。
……わかっていて賭けたんだ、頼むぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002260_RASHO<tab>I understand. You have your doubts. We are pirates, after all, with hardly the strength of a nation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002260_RASHO<tab>悪いな、気負わせてしまったか。
土台、俺たちは海賊衆……
国だ何だと語るような存在ではない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002270_RASHO<tab>But when we saw what you few had accomplished, our hearts could not choose but stir in our breasts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002270_RASHO<tab>お前たちは、喧嘩が強い。
そして俺たちは、その腕っぷしに惚れ込んだ……
単にそれだけのことだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002280_ALISAIE<tab>Your assistance would be most welcome. Nevertheless, we shall do our utmost to spare you undue danger─we are already in your debt.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002280_ALISAIE<tab>協力してくれて、本当にありがとう。
あなたたちに危険が及ぶ前に手を打てるよう、
最善を尽くすわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002290_TANSUI<tab>Nay, little miss, all debts are paid. For by your deeds, many still live who elsewise would not. Let both parties count their blessings, and may fortune continue to favor us all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002290_TANSUI<tab>おう、礼を言いたいのはこっちなんだがな。
そいつは、お互い無事に生き残ってからにするわ。
せいぜい期待して、朗報を待ってるぜ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002300_RASHO<tab>You still seek to bring freedom to our people, then? You will go to Yanxia?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002300_RASHO<tab>……ところで、お前らはこれからどこに？
ドマの解放を目指すとなると、やっぱり「ヤンサ」か？

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002310_GOSETSU<tab>I have faith that our allies yet live.
Once we have found them, we will plan our next step.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002310_GOSETSU<tab>そのつもりでござる。
かの地には、今も拙者の仲間が潜んでいるはず……
合流し、次の手を講じるといたそう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002320_RASHO<tab>Yanxia was the crucible of the rebellion. What happened here pales in comparison to what Yotsuyu did there.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002320_RASHO<tab>「ヤンサ」は、ドマ城を有する、動乱の中心地。
今回は幸い、この村を救うことができたが、
あちらの集落は大方、ヨツユの粛清を受けたあとだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002330_RASHO<tab>Remember this: fear changes men. Have care in whom you place your trust.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002330_RASHO<tab>敵はもちろん、味方だと思っている奴にも気を付けろ。
あの女が振りまく絶望は、人を変える。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002340_TANSUI<tab>And with that, we must take our wounded home. Oh! Your shellback friend sends his regards, and looks forward to your next meeting. Try not to die before then, eh?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002340_TANSUI<tab>じゃ、俺たちは、仲間を連れて根城に帰るぜ。
ああ、ソロバンの奴も、機会があればまた取引したいそうだ。
……それまで、絶対に負けんじゃねぇぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002349_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, on the shores of Othard...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002349_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>同日 紅玉海沿岸――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002350_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>We cannot rest here for long. This place is not safe...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002350_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>ひと休みしたら、すぐ行くぞォー。
運び出さねばならんものは、ほかにもあるんだからなァー。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002360_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>...Mayhap nowhere is, if thieves can breach our vaults. Nevertheless, it is our duty to protect these treasures, and we shall not fail for want of effort.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002360_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>まったく、ヒトの侵入者におくれを取るとは……。
また攻め込まれてはたまらん、特に大事な宝物だけでも、
しばし余所に移動せねば……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002370_YOTSUYU<tab>So this is why you abandoned your posts─and without a word of explanation at that. Rather thoughtless of you, was it not?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002370_YOTSUYU<tab>あたしの頼んだ任務を放り出して、お出かけかい？
連絡もなしとは、つれないじゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002380_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>Lady Yotsuyu! Pray forgive us our absence, but our home was under attack─our vaults plundered by outsiders!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002380_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>ヨ、ヨツユ殿ォー！
もうしわけない、一族の危機であったのだァー。
我らが拠点が、ヒトの襲撃を受けて……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002390_YOTSUYU<tab>Did you even pause to consider the possibility that it might be a diversion? What is the point of contracting your services if you are not here when they are required?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002390_YOTSUYU<tab>はぁ……海賊衆に、上手いことハメられたんだねぇ。
まったく、肝心なときに無能なんじゃ、何のための契約よ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002400_YOTSUYU<tab>It is my solemn charge to bring these vermin to heel─to torment them, body and soul, until all they hold dear is as bitter ashes in their mouths. And then you go and ruin everything!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002400_YOTSUYU<tab>おかげで、あたしまで仕事を果たせなかった。
あいつらを虐げて、身も心も引き裂いて……
生き様すべてを踏みにじってから、殺してやるはずだったのに。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002410_YOTSUYU<tab>...Well, there's naught to be gained in belaboring the point.
All that remains is to administer your punishment.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002410_YOTSUYU<tab>まあ、済んだことは仕方がない。
代理総督として、お前さんたちに、
任務を果たせなかった罰を下そうじゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002420_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>Wait, my lady!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002420_KOUJINTAICHO<tab>待て、待つのだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002430_YOTSUYU<tab>No...no, it's no good. There's just no joy in it. No release.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002430_YOTSUYU<tab>はぁ……ダメ……全然ダメ……。
こいつらなんかじゃ、嗤えもしないわ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002440_YOTSUYU<tab>There...there needs to be some investment. They were negligent imbeciles deserving of punishment, but it was hardly personal. Ten thousand such Kojin could not satisfy me half so well as a single Doman.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002440_YOTSUYU<tab>当然よねぇ……不愉快だけど、恨んでないもの。
やっぱり、嬲るのはドマの連中でないと…………。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002450_YOTSUYU<tab>And what do we have here? One of the vaunted treasures of the Red?
The craftsmanship is certainly impressive...
Mayhap we can use it to make amends.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002450_YOTSUYU<tab>これは……紅甲羅の御神刀かい？
なるほど、妖刀と噂に聞くだけあって、業物じゃないか。
今回の失態は、これで清算できるかもねぇ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002460_GRYNEWAHT<tab>How long before Lord Zenos reinstates me, d'you reckon? I've got unfinished business back in Eorzea...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002460_GRYNEWAHT<tab>ゼ、ゼノスさま、許してくれるか？
サセンは嫌だ……はやく戻って、あいつと戦いたいど……。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002470_YOTSUYU<tab>Is serving me really so unbearable?
At least pretend to enjoy it, you witless lump!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002470_YOTSUYU<tab>お前さん、そんなにあたしの下が嫌かい？
つくづく躾のなってない阿呆だねぇ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002480_YOTSUYU<tab>If you are so desperate to earn a way back to Eorzea, then be quiet and do as you're told. And bring that sword while you're at it!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002480_YOTSUYU<tab>「あいつ」っていうのが、どちら様だか知らないけどね。
望みを叶えたいなら、死ぬ気で働くもんさ。
……わかったら、この刀を持ってきな、木偶の坊。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002490_LYSENARRATION<tab>I remember the silence. How the talking stopped when we first set foot on the plains of Yanxia.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002490_LYSENARRATION<tab>ドマの領地 ヤンサ
踏み入ったその場所は 静けさに包まれていた

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002500_LYSENARRATION<tab>Before us stood yet another wall, and through a great magitek field we glimpsed Doma Castle.
I'll never forget the sight...or the anger I felt that day.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002500_LYSENARRATION<tab>けれど 巨大な魔導フィールドの向こう
隔離されたドマ城を見たときの気持ちは 今も忘れられない

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002510_LYSENARRATION<tab>Life. Liberty. Hope. So much lost, so much taken.
As we walked through that war-torn land, no one said a word...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002510_LYSENARRATION<tab>命 尊厳 希望 あらゆるものを失った国
静寂を掻きわけて アタシたちは進んでいった

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002520_ALISAIE<tab>We may be in luck. I don't see a single imperial soldier.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002520_ALISAIE<tab>少なくともここからは、
帝国兵がいるようには見えないわね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002530_GOSETSU<tab>Then there is no need to remain hidden. Let us go and greet them as friends.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002530_GOSETSU<tab>よぉし、ならば隠れる必要もござらん。
行って、直接話を聞くとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002540_LYSE<tab>I'm going too!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002540_LYSE<tab>アタシたちも、行ってみよう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002550_GOSETSU<tab>Good people of Namai, hearken to me! We come in peace and desire only information─to learn of recent events!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002550_GOSETSU<tab>頼もうッ！
ナマイ村の皆よ、健在でござるか。
この一帯の状況を教えてくれぃ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002560_E3F2VILLAGERA<tab>Isn't that the general?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002560_E3F2VILLAGERA<tab>あれって、まさか侍大将の……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002570_E3F2VILLAGERB<tab>Lord Gosetsu!? Kami preserve, you're right! He lives!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002570_E3F2VILLAGERB<tab>間違いねぇ、ゴウセツ様だ……！
生きてたのか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002580_GOSETSU<tab>I say, brothers and sisters, is aught amiss? Why do you regard me as one would a wild beast? Why is there fear in your eyes? Why do you tremble so?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002580_GOSETSU<tab>むう？　皆、どうしたでござるか。
そろいもそろって、化け物でも見たような顔しおって。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002590_GOSETSU<tab>Ahhh, but of course! You fear me a vengeful spirit of the dead! Rest assured, naught could be further from the truth. For am I not corporeal? Are my feet not firmly set upon the ground? Hah hah!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002590_GOSETSU<tab>……ははぁん、さては拙者、死んだと思われておったな？
あっはっは、確かに幾度か死にかけたが、
ほれ、足もあれば透けてもおらん！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002600_E3F2VILLAGERA<tab>What should we do? If they catch him here, you know what will happen...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002600_E3F2VILLAGERA<tab>どうしましょう、
こんなところを帝国の人に見られたら……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002610_E3F2VILLAGERB<tab>Of all the times for him to turn up─ Has the old fool lost his mind?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002610_E3F2VILLAGERB<tab>まったくだ、今更なんのつもりで……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002620_ISSE<tab>(-Flustered Youth-)You! But... Why have you come here? What do you want from us?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002620_ISSE<tab>(-ナマイ村の青年-)あんた、どうしてここに……！
何してるんだよ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002630_GOSETSU<tab>I know not who you are to speak thus to your elders, boy, but mine only desire is to be received with the hospitality owed a humble traveler─not the fear and trepidation one might afford a wrathful shade!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002630_GOSETSU<tab>なんだ小僧、村の者か？
どうしても何も、話を聞きに来ただけでござる。
警戒せずとも、化けて出たわけではござらん！

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002640_ISSE<tab>(-Flustered Youth-)What? What are you going on about? Actually, never mind.
Just come with me─now!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002640_ISSE<tab>(-ナマイ村の青年-)そういう話じゃなくて！
……あーもう、とにかくこっちに！　早く！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002650_LYSE<tab>This is the House of the Fierce? But there are so few of them...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002650_LYSE<tab>ここが、烈士庵……。
たったこれだけの人数で戦いを……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002660_GOSETSU<tab>Many kindred spirits remain in hiding following the rebellion. Many others gave their lives for their nation. We are the stubborn remainder.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002660_GOSETSU<tab>先の反乱以前は、かなりの数の同志が国中に潜んでおった。
だが、戦火の中で多くの仲間は斃れ、
一命をとりとめた者が、ようやくここに集ったのでござる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002670_GOSETSU<tab>Even accounting for our comrades in the field, we are at a fraction of our former strength, 'tis true. Yet we few are patriots─brothers-in-arms, prepared to fight with every fiber of our being to set our people free.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002670_GOSETSU<tab>任務に出ている者も含め、全員をかき集めたとて、
かつての戦力には遠く及ばぬが……皆、立派な憂国の士。
今なお挫けずドマ解放を目指す、同志でござる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002680_YUGIRI<tab>Ever are we hopeful that others will join our cause. But never did I dream that you would journey so far.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002680_YUGIRI<tab>(-？？？？-)そう、我々は大義のため、ともに命を懸ける同志。
……そこに、貴殿たちが訪ねてきてくれるとは、
想像していなかったがな。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002690_LYSE<tab>Yugiri! Gods, it's good to see you! You look great, by the way!
Have you been here long?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002690_LYSE<tab>ユウギリ！
よかった、元気そうだね……！
思ったよりも早い再会になったけど、会えてうれしいよ。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002700_YUGIRI<tab>I returned but recently, having concluded my mission.
Oh, it is good to see you again, my friends.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002700_YUGIRI<tab>ああ……。
今しがた、ちょうど任務を終えて帰還した。
おかげさまで、今のところは息災だ。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002710_GOSETSU<tab>Did I hear aright? Your mission is concluded?
Then you have found the young master?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002710_GOSETSU<tab>なに、任務を終えたと！？
ということは、若が見つかったのか！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002720_YUGIRI<tab>Ere we speak of that, I would know by what fortuitous circumstance our friends came to be here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002720_YUGIRI<tab>落ち着いてくれ。
まずは、どうして彼らがおぬしとともにここへ来たのか、
それを聞かせてもらえないだろうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002730_YUGIRI<tab>The Empire's crimes are all too familiar. Lyse─my heart goes out to your people.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002730_YUGIRI<tab>……なるほど。
アラミゴの方で、そんなことが……。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002740_LYSE<tab>We wanted to stay and fight, believe me, but we knew it wouldn't work.
We needed more time to rebuild─and more allies to stand with us against
the Empire.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002740_LYSE<tab>本当だったら、すぐにでも帝国軍と戦いたいよ……。
でも、アラミゴ解放軍には、立て直す時間も、
帝国と戦う仲間も必要なんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002750_LYSE<tab>So we decided to come here and help you free Doma. To show you─to show everyone─that you're not alone, and that the Garleans can be beaten, if we work together. I'd like to think we proved that in the Ruby Sea...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002750_LYSE<tab>そのためにも、ドマの解放に力を貸したい！
動機は、あなたたちと少し違うかもしれないけれど……
紅玉海で、アタシたちの決意はみせたつもりだよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002760_YUGIRI<tab>That you did, Lyse, and far more besides. Needless to say, your assistance would be most welcome.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002760_YUGIRI<tab>……その心意気、しかと受け取った。
こちらからも是非、貴殿たちに協力を願いたい。
どうか、よろしく頼む。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002770_GOSETSU<tab>Hear, hear! Now then, Yugiri─you must tell me of your search for our master!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002770_GOSETSU<tab>して、ユウギリよ！
おぬしに頼んでおった、若の捜索はどうなったのだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002780_YUGIRI<tab>Lest you wonder, he speaks of Lord Hien, son of Lord Kaien, who perished during the rebellion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002780_YUGIRI<tab>先の反乱で亡くなられたカイエン様の御子息……
国主の後継者であり、今は我らの主でもあるヒエン様を、
ゴウセツと私は探していた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002790_YUGIRI<tab>When it became clear that all hope of victory had gone, Lord Hien bade us deliver as many of our people as we could to safety beyond our borders. But as his father's heir, he was determined to fight on, and so he did─until he suffered a grievous wound in battle and vanished without a trace...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002790_YUGIRI<tab>敗戦の折、私に民を逃がすように命じたヒエン様は、
しばしこの地で帝国と戦い続けていたそうだが、
最後には深手を負い、行方不明になっておられたのだ……。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002800_YUGIRI<tab>Until now. For I have found Lord Hien─seen and spoken with him.
On the Azim Steppe.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002800_YUGIRI<tab>しかし、此度の捜索で、
私はついにヒエン様にお会いすることができた。
場所は、アジムステップ……ドマの領外だ。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002810_GOSETSU<tab>O boundless and merciful kami, the young master lives!
Tell me, was he well? Did his wound yet ail him? Where is he now?
Have you brought him back to us!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002810_GOSETSU<tab>ま、まことでござるか！
若はご無事であられたのか！？
今はどちらに！？　まさか、すでにここへ……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002820_YUGIRI<tab>You may take comfort in the knowledge that he is hale and whole. However, when I invited him to return with me to Doma, he had this to say...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002820_YUGIRI<tab>ヒエン様はご存命で、傷も大方癒えていた。
だが、ドマへの帰還を願う私に、こう言われたのだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002830_YUGIRI<tab>"If Doma yet thirsts for the blood of patriots and tyrants, I shall offer unto her my blade. But if she has had her fill of bitter draughts, I shall offer unto her conquerors my head.“
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002830_YUGIRI<tab>民がなお戦を望むのであれば、将として戻ろう。
しかし、これ以上の戦乱を望まぬのであれば、
自分の首を持ち帰り、帝国に差し出すべし……と。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002840_YUGIRI<tab>Thrice did I declare to him that no true son or daughter of Doma would ever accept such a sacrifice. But for all my passion, he would not be swayed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002840_YUGIRI<tab>ヒエン様の首を差し出して助かろうなどと、
ドマの民が思うはずがない……
私はそう訴えたのだが、あの方の決意は揺るがなかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002850_YUGIRI<tab>"Learn the truth of her heart and return to me,“ he said. And so I left him.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002850_YUGIRI<tab>ならば、真実を確かめて参りましょうと、
私はこちらに帰還してきたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002860_GOSETSU<tab>The words of one made to wear the mantle of leadership too soon...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002860_GOSETSU<tab>ふぅむ……そう出られたか……。
なるほど、若らしいご決断にござる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002870_GOSETSU<tab>Yet there is wisdom in them all the same. If the people no longer yearn to be free, 'twould be folly to rekindle the fires of war.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002870_GOSETSU<tab>あの方は、民あっての主君であると、誰より理解しておられる。
ゆえに、まず民に再起の志がなくば、
戦いを強いはしまいと言いたいのでござろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002880_YUGIRI<tab>To suffer our master to surrender his life and forsake all hope of freedom is by far the greater folly. I will not go to face my fallen comrades having done naught to stop it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002880_YUGIRI<tab>どうあれ、主君に国と命を捨てさせてなるものか。
そのような結末、散っていった者にも申し訳がたたぬ。
私は何があっても、戦い続けるぞ……！

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002890_GOSETSU<tab>Nor I, shadow walker, nor I. But we need not rouse our comrades to battle
this day. Let us instead welcome our honored guests and allow them a
moment of respite.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002890_GOSETSU<tab>その問答、今は控えておけ。
はるばる西方から来てくれた仲間を労り、
ここは一度休憩といたそう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002900_LYSE<tab>Imperials...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002900_LYSE<tab>あれは、帝国軍の……！

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002910_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>Why are you milling about like a pack of slack-jawed mongrels!?
Form a line! Now!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002910_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>何を呆けている！
整列ッ、今すぐにだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002920_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>...Finally. I come before you today to deliver an announcement of the highest import, so listen well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002920_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>…………よし。
今日は、貴様らに重要な通達がある。
心して聞くように。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002930_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>While on a charitable mission to Isari village, the acting viceroy and her personal guard came under attack from Confederate forces. This brazen, unconscionable act cannot─and will not─go unanswered.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002930_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>先日、イサリ村にて、海賊衆による総督襲撃事件が発生した。
これは実にゆゆしき事態であり、
ドマに駐屯する帝国軍をあげて、制裁を下さねばならない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002940_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>As loyal subjects of the Empire who enjoy her safety and prosperity, you have a duty to defend her as well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002940_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>同じく皇帝陛下に忠誠を誓った貴様らも、
当然、この戦に協力する義務がある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002950_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>...There is no cause for alarm. We have no intention of sending ill-trained fodder to the front line.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002950_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>フン、そう怯えるな。
貴様らごときを、前線に送ろうとは思っておらん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002960_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>Those who are selected will be expected to perform rudimentary tasks. Cleaning and maintenance and so forth. You will serve only as long as you are needed. Afterwards, you will be free to return to your homes.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002960_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>これから指名する者は、我々に同行し、
兵器の手入れに協力するように。
なに、終わればすぐに解放してやる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002970_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>You. You first.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002970_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>まずはお前だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002980_YUGIRI<tab>Hmph. The Empire has no pressing need of cleaners. This is but a thinly veiled attempt to intimidate those who supported the Confederacy's actions, and isolate any whose loyalty they already suspect.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002980_YUGIRI<tab>連中に慈悲などあるものか……！
真の狙いは恐らく、海賊衆に同調して蜂起しそうな者を、
隔離しておくことだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002990_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>And lastly...you. That should suffice for now.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_002990_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>最後は、お前だな。
……ひとまずは、これくらいで十分だろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003000_ISSE<tab>Don't worry, I will be back before you know it. Listen to the elders while I am away, and do not play outside the village. Everything is going to be fine. I love you, all right? Remember that I love you...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003000_ISSE<tab>……大丈夫、すぐ戻ってくるさ。
村のみんなの言うことを聞いて、いい子にしてるんだぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003010_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>We thank you for your cooperation. Rest assured that this will all be over very soon─once the Confederacy has been made to pay our own “Ruby Tithe.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003010_GARLEANLEADERDOMA<tab>では、本日の用件はこれまでだ。
くれぐれも、海賊衆のような愚かな企てはせんことだな。
連中は、今に血祭にあげられよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003020_LYSE<tab>There's no telling what might happen to those people! We have to help them!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003020_LYSE<tab>こんなの嫌だよ、あの子たちを助けなきゃ！
連れて行かれて、酷い目にあうかもしれない……！

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003030_YUGIRI<tab>And we shall. But before all else, we must needs ascertain their destination.
I doubt this is the first village the Garleans have visited...nor is it like to
be the last.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003030_YUGIRI<tab>わかっている……絶対に、このままにしておくものか……！
だが、恐らくほかの村でも、同様の徴集が行われているはず。
だとすれば、集合場所までは泳がせるべきだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003040_YUGIRI<tab>I will track these men. Will you help me?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003040_YUGIRI<tab>奴らを追いたい。
場合によっては、戦いになる可能性がある……。
貴殿の力を貸してもらえるだろうか？

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003050_YUGIRI<tab>Pray return to our headquarters and tell the others what you saw here.
Should we have need of reinforcements, I would know that they are ready.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003050_YUGIRI<tab>リセ……貴殿は烈士庵に戻り、同志にこのことを伝えてほしい。
皆の力が必要になったら、すぐに要請する。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003060_LYSE<tab>But I should be going with you! I came here to fight!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003060_LYSE<tab>そんな、アタシもユウギリたちと行くよ！
待機なんてしてらんないッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003070_YUGIRI<tab>Soon enough, Lyse. Soon enough. For now, we must proceed with caution.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003070_YUGIRI<tab>……貴殿の優しさ、痛み入る。
だが、今は極力少人数で追跡すべきだ。
どうか理解し、協力してほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003080_LYSE<tab>I know that, I do... It's just─when I saw them rounding those people up... Look, if anything happens─anything at all─you'd better call for us! I mean it, Yugiri. Anything at all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003080_LYSE<tab>…………ごめん、わかったよ。
目の前だけ見ててもダメだって、また忘れかけてた。
だけど、ピンチになったら、絶対呼んでね……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003090_YUGIRI<tab>Listen to me, all of you! We have dealt with the imperials for now, but you must flee this place, quickly!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003090_YUGIRI<tab>皆、聞いてくれ。
しばしの間、帝国兵の監視は途切れている。
今のうちに、ここから逃げるんだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003100_E3F2VILLAGERD<tab>D-Dealt with them? Oh...oh no...you didn't kill them, did you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003100_E3F2VILLAGERD<tab>監視が……？
いったいどういうことだ？
まさかお前たち、帝国兵を倒したのか……！？

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003110_E3F2VILLAGERA<tab>Are you mad!? There's no escaping the Empire!
Running will only make it worse!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003110_E3F2VILLAGERA<tab>ああ、なんてことを……！
逃げ切れるわけがない、あとで酷い仕打ちをうけるわ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003120_YUGIRI<tab>To stay is to die. You know this to be true.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003120_YUGIRI<tab>……ここに残っても、死ぬのと変わるものか。
それくらい、貴殿たちもわかっていよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003130_YUGIRI<tab>Even if you lack the will to fight, surely you have the will to live! Or has that, too, been beaten out of you? Is this what has become of Doma!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003130_YUGIRI<tab>敵に攻め入る意思がなくとも、
己を守る気概くらい、持ち合わせてはいないのか？
ドマの民は、それほどの燃えさしに成り下がったのか！

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003140_ISSE<tab>You are Lord Hien's retainer?
Trained to fight without fear and obey without question?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04002_003140_ISSE<tab>あんた、忍びだろ……。
何を犠牲にしても主君に従うよう、仕込まれてる。
それで、前だけ向いてられるんだ……！
